number of helpful: 1 person found this review helpful
content:
Posted: January 26, 2012
												The character creator for Saint's Row. Has a pretty in decent editor (lots of sliders, but not many great results) and plenty of skin/hair choices. A very large amount of tattoo and clothing options available. The body shape editor is weak, and I hate how clothes are labeled, making it hard to find what you want until you memorized the list. The worst part is that your screenshots are private only, so you can't share them without some ingenuity. That said, it's fun to mess around with and a fantastic way to promote a game. More devs should do something like this.
